description: Learning through negotiation is a wonderful thing. Eric was helping Shane study physiology and poor Shane just wasnt getting it. Well, Eric decided to show Shane first hand by getting it. You see, there is no better way to learn than by doing, and that is just what Shane did. He did Eric. Suddenly, they both got it. Eric showed Shane how to pass the oral. Lets hope Shane got it enough to pass his written test too.
title: Study Balls
